title: Riot please help (Windows 10)
body: Recently i have been given 10 match made bans from afk because my game will not launch and i have reinstalled it 5 times but it still continues to crash i have tried multiple methods such as repairing files and cleaning the pc it wont work please help{{champion:64}} (FIXED THANKS GUYS)

replies.body:
Hey there,

I'm currently running Windows 10 and not experiencing any issues with league.

Could you elaborate on your specific issue? When is the game crashing? Is there anything consistent between the crashes?
Can you run through the [Bug Splat & Game Crashes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) article and let me know if anything there helps.

Could you try running the game as admin and in compatibility mode (set to Windows 7 or lower)

Hope this helps,
Seph
Its crashing right after I leave champ select and i have received i just tried running as admin and did not work and how do i run in compatibility mode?

Do you run lolreplay/any replay tool as DTN asked above? If so please disable these as users have reported issues with them causing crashes.

The game can be run in compatibility mode by right clicking the executable, going to properties, compatibility, selecting run this program in compatibility mode and choosing Windows 7 or lower.
http://puu.sh/n1cvV/247a5ae4b4.png

Hey ItsKaneki,

Is your game crashing at the loading screen after champion select? If you happen to be using Lolreplay/recorder to record your games, please exit or uninstall it for now, as it is known to be causing League to crash currently. Let me know if that helps.

-DTN
